opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed on the opinion of Baldrige, J.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: H. R. Phillips, Assistant District Attorney, with him Andrew T. Park, District Attorney, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth, Appellant, v. Bardolph.
Argued March 23, 1934.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
Keller, J., filed a dissenting opinion, in which Cunningham and Stadteeld, JJ., concurred.
H. R. Phillips, Assistant District Attorney, with him Andrew T. Park, District Attorney, for appellant.
Charles B. Prichard, for appellee.
April 23, 1934:
